meanings.definition: A room in a private house or establishment where people can sit and talk.
meanings.sent1: In the parlour, the family gathered to chat after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The cozy parlour was filled with comfortable chairs for guests to relax in.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided the parlour was the perfect spot to have a meowing conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a parlour of thoughts, each one waiting to be discussed.
meanings.sent5: The parlour buzzed with laughter and stories, creating a warm atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A shop or business providing a specified service or product.
meanings.sent1: The parlour down the street offers delicious ice cream flavors.
meanings.sent2: I visited the parlour to get my hair styled for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The parlour was so busy that the customers had to wait in line for their turn.
meanings.sent4: The parlour of beauty products was a treasure trove of skincare essentials.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the parlour felt like stepping into a world of pampering and luxury.
